metadata.title: CVE-2021-33796 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In MuJS before version 1.1.2, a use-after-free flaw in the regexp sourceproperty access may cause denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33796` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmujs1 - 1.1.3-3
mujs - 1.1.3-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mujs package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.3-3').
